definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom)/fig. to cheat/dishonest advertising/wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue
pinyin: gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4

definition: see 掛羊頭賣狗肉|挂羊头卖狗肉[gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4]
see 掛羊頭賣狗肉|挂羊头卖狗肉[gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4]
pinyin: xuan2 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4

sentences.english: The dog died during the spring festival, and the dog skin is still on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 過年殺的狗肉早已喫光，狗皮一直掛在牆上。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cheat who advertises lamb but sells dog meat poisons his customers.
sentences.chinese: 更有甚者，掛羊頭賣狗肉，毒也。

sentences.english: While in Yulin, Guangxi province, there is a dog meat festival that held every year.
sentences.chinese: 然而在廣西省玉林市，有個每年都舉行的狗肉節。

sentences.english: Lenard Wilkins, an elder member of the city council was also in attendance.
sentences.chinese: 參與狗肉美食節的一位市議會的前輩級人物。

sentences.english: They display the sheep's head of constitutional government while selling the dog-meat of one-party dictatorship.
sentences.chinese: 他們是在掛憲政的羊頭，賣一黨專政的狗肉。

sentences.english: Yes, you could do some trickery here with .
sentences.chinese: 的是的，你可以在這裏做一些掛羊頭賣狗肉與。

sentences.english: Dog meat sales were banned in Beijing during the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 在奧運期間，北京禁止賣狗肉。

sentences.english: To sell horse meat as beefsteak is their usual practice.
sentences.chinese: 掛羊頭賣狗肉是他們的慣技。

sentences.english: I hope anyone partaking in this disgusting festival chokes on their dog or cat meat.
sentences.chinese: 我希望所有參加這個噁心節日的人都被貓肉狗肉噎死。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has signaled a willingness to take the meat off the market.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府已表示願意讓貓肉和狗肉在市場上消失。

sentences.english: Then they're asked if the dog-chomping family should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 然後有些人在質疑，這個家庭是否應該停止食用狗肉。

sentences.english: Unlicensed restaurants are out, as is serving dog meat.
sentences.chinese: 無照餐館被取締，也禁止食用狗肉。

sentences.english: Pictures of carnage from the dog eating festival made their way on to the internet, incensing thousands.
sentences.chinese: 狗肉節上的大屠殺圖片流傳至網絡，引發羣憤。

sentences.english: I'm afraid I don't like snake dishes or dog meat.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡喫蛇或狗肉做的菜。

sentences.english: So why the fuss about dogmeat?
sentences.chinese: 所以喫狗肉有什麼值得大驚小怪的。

sentences.english: People of Phillipine also like dog meat.
